mapper.sql: snapshotId, profileid, region, status, recordType, opttime,campaignType ,requesttime ,treat_number,treat_status,log
mapper.select: SELECT * from t_amz_adv_snapshot where recordType= #{recordType,jdbcType=CHAR} and campaignType= #{campaignType,jdbcType=CHAR} and requesttime>=DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -20 HOUR) and treat_number<10 and (status='IN_PROGRESS' or status='SUCCESS') and (treat_status is null or treat_status='error' or treat_status='') limit 200
